alert_rules.description: Non-urgent notifications and scheduled reports. No SLA required. For situational awareness, trend analysis, and executive reporting. Email delivery only.

scheduled_reports.name: Daily Security Digest
scheduled_reports.description: Morning summary of security events from previous 24 hours. Provides situational awareness for security team without requiring immediate action.

email_template.subject: Daily Security Digest - {{date}}

scheduled_reports.name: Weekly Security Summary
scheduled_reports.description: Comprehensive weekly report with trends, metrics, and highlights. Sent Friday end-of-day for executive review and team retrospective.

email_template.subject: Weekly Security Summary - Week {{week_number}}

scheduled_reports.name: Monthly Executive Report
scheduled_reports.description: Comprehensive monthly report for CISO, executives, and board. Includes KPIs, compliance status, major incidents, initiatives, and budget. Sent first Monday of month.

schedule.description: First Monday of each month at 9 AM UTC

email_template.subject: Monthly Executive Security Report - {{month}} {{year}}

ad_hoc_reports.description: On-demand reports available via CLI: openclaw-security-cli.py report generate --type [incident|compliance|user_activity|vulnerabilities]

available_reports.name: Incident Response Report
available_reports.output: PDF with timeline, actions taken, evidence, root cause, lessons learned

available_reports.name: User Activity Report
available_reports.output: CSV with all user activities for forensic analysis

available_reports.name: Compliance Audit Package
available_reports.output: ZIP with evidence for all SOC 2 controls (dashboards, logs, policies)

retention_policy.ad_hoc_reports: As needed per incident retention policy
